task.title: Changing the size and appearance of point objects
task.shortdesc: Changing the size and appearance of point objects affects all point objects already in the drawing, as wel as all points that you subsequently draw. Positive values represent the absolute size of the point object measured in drawing units. Negative values represent a percentage relative to the drawing screen so that points retain their visual size as you use the Zoomcommand to change the magnification of the drawing.

context.p: To change the size and appearance of point objects

step.cmd: Choose Format > Point Style from the main menu.
Under Point Style, select the style you want.
Under Point Size, specifythe point size, or choose one of the options.

result.p: When you regenerate the drawing, all point objects change to reflect the new size and appearance settings.
